high_descs: walk to the bed, where there is a bunch of items.
pick up one of the white towels from top of the bed.
take the desklamp with you to the nightstand.
Place the desklamp next to the nightstand.
anns.task_desc: Pick a towel from the bed and bring to the DeskLamp.

high_descs: Turn around to reach the bed.
Pick up the towel at the back of the bed in the middle.
Turn left to reach the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine the towel under the lamp light.

high_descs: get the towel on the bed.
walk over to the desk lamp.
anns.task_desc: get a towel from the bed and turn the desk lamp on.
